subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The backup Korie Lucious, playing in place of the Spartans star Kalin Lucas, hit a 3-pointer in the final second to edge Maryland, 85-83.
snippet: The backup Korie Lucious, playing in place of the Spartans star Kalin Lucas, hit a 3-pointer in the final second to edge Maryland, 85-83.
